full_title: KAKSS Neoprene Dumbbells Set, 1kg Pair (2 x 0.5kg), Pink Hex Dumbbells with Easy-Grip Coated Finish, Cast Iron Hand Weights for Home Gym Equipment and Fitness Training for Women and Men

reasoning.keyword_strategy: Integrated highest-volume keywords: 'dumbbells set' (#1), 'dumbbells' (#2), 'weights for women' (#7), 'gym equipment' (#14). Used verified facts: hex shape, neoprene coating, cast iron material. Structured as natural product description with 'for women and men' to capture gender-specific searches.
